text: Yeh aath (eight) narr o mada (couples) hain, do bhedh (sheep) ki qisam se aur do bakri ki qisam se. (Aey Muhammad)! Insey pucho ke Allah ne unke narr haraam kiye hain ya maada, ya woh bacchey jo bhedon (sheeps) aur bakriyon ke pait mein hon? Theek theek ilm ke saath mujhey batao agar tum sacchey ho
